testsuite.name: com.sample.modules.HomePage
testsuite.system-out: Step 1 : Open URL - https://www.makemytrip.com/ Step 2 : Verify mmt country & currency selection section present. Step 3 : Click on mmt country & currency selection section present. Step 4 : Select country USA from dropdown. Step 5 : Click on apply button. Step 6 : Verify language english annd currency USD selected. PASS : verifyCountryCurrencyWidget
